title: Commerce Metrics
description: Quantifiable measures used to track and assess the status of a commerce business process.

productViews.title: Product Views
productViews.description: Number of views of a product has occurred. (same as productView in Adobe Analytics).

productListOpens.title: Product List Opens
productListOpens.description: Number of opens, initializations of a new product list has occurred. (same as scOpen in Adobe Analytics).

productListAdds.title: Product List Adds
productListAdds.description: Number of adds of a product to the product list has occurred. (same as scAdd in Adobe Analytics).

productListRemovals.title: Product List Removals
productListRemovals.description: Number of removals of a product entry from a product list has occurred. (same as scRemove in Adobe Analytics).

productListViews.title: Product List Views
productListViews.description: Number of views of a product list has occurred. (same as scView in Adobe Analytics)

saveForLaters.title: Save for Laters
saveForLaters.description: Number of requests to save a product list for a future session.

checkouts.title: Checkouts
checkouts.description:
Number of actions during a checkout process of a product list, there can be more than one checkout event if there are multiple steps in a checkout
process. If there are multiple steps the event time information and
referenced page or experience is used to identify the step individual
events represent in order.

abandons.title: Abandons
abandons.description: Number of abandons for which a product list has been identified as no longer purchasable or accessible by the user without the user re-creating the product list from scratch.

productListReopens.title: Product List Reopens
productListReopens.description: Number of reopens for which a product list that was no longer accessible has been re-activated by the user, for example via a re-marketing activity.

purchases.title: Purchases
purchases.description: Number of orders has occurred. purchase is the only required action in a commerce conversion. Purchase must have a product list referenced. (same as Adobe Analytics)
